data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Santa Cruz, Cape Verde.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Santa Cruz, Cape Verde
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Santa Cruz, Cape Verde today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Santa Cruz that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Spirit, protect the overcomers in Santa Cruz, Cape Verde, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Santa Cruz
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Santa Cruz, Santa Cruz, Cape Verde.
Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Santa Cruz, Cape Verde.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Santa Cruz, Cape Verde. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Santa Cruz, Cape Verde has a population of 26,100.

We estimate Santa Cruz has 2,182 people who might know Jesus, 20,252 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,666 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Santa Cruz, Cape Verde with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.
